name: RogueChess
description:
Chess, gone Rogue!

RogueChess is the classic game of chess we all know and love, but throw out any and all rules you remember and mix up how each piece moves!

After each round, you will be given a random assortment of tiles. When you drag one of them onto one of your pieces, that piece will be upgraded and gain more movement options, aiding you in victory.

However, if you lose one single match, you'll lose all your upgrades! So try your best to get an awesome win streak!

Controls

Everything is controlled with your mouse!

Drag and drop your pieces with your mouse to make your move

Drag an upgrade at the start and move it on a piece to upgrade it
